scripts.src:build: npx node-sass src -o "./jekyll/assets/css" --indent-width=2 --output-style=expanded && npx postcss "./jekyll/assets/css/refresh.css" --use autoprefixer -d "./jekyll/assets/css"
scripts.prime: npm run clean && npx node-sass src -o "./bin" --indent-width=2 --output-style=expanded && npx postcss "./bin/refresh.css" --use autoprefixer -d "./bin" && npx postcss "./bin/refresh.css" > "./bin/refresh.min.css" -u cssnano && npm run docs:build && npm run src:build && git add . && git status
scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others "npm run src:serve" "npm run docs:serve"
